**Algorithm/Feature to Validate**
Name and brief description of what needs medical validation.

**Purpose**
Why this algorithm/feature is needed and what problem it solves.

**Technical Description**
How the algorithm/feature works (technical details).

**Medical Context**
Relevant medical context, protocols, or guidelines.

**Data Sources**
What data was used to develop/test this:
- [ ] Public datasets
- [ ] Synthetic data
- [ ] Anonymized real data
- [ ] Medical literature

**Performance Metrics**
Current performance metrics (accuracy, precision, recall, etc.)

**Known Limitations**
Any known limitations or edge cases.

**Validation Requirements**
What specific validation is needed:
- [ ] Algorithm logic review
- [ ] Clinical protocol alignment
- [ ] Safety assessment
- [ ] Performance validation
- [ ] Ethical review

**Priority**
- [ ] High (blocking release)
- [ ] Medium (needed for next release)
- [ ] Low (future improvement)

**Additional Documentation**
Links to any additional documentation, research papers, or references.
